name: @opencode-cloud/core
description: Core NAPI bindings for opencode-cloud (internal package)
author: pRizz

scripts.build: napi build --platform --release --features napi --no-js && cp src/bindings.js index.js && cp src/bindings.d.ts index.d.ts
scripts.build:debug: napi build --platform --features napi --no-js && cp src/bindings.js index.js && cp src/bindings.d.ts index.d.ts
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Building native module (requires Rust 1.85+)...' && npm run build
